rule.name: CyclomaticComplexityRule
rule.message: The {0} ''{1}'' has a Cyclomatic Complexity of {2}.
rule.description: Complexity is determined by the number of decision points in a method plus one for the method entry. The decision points are 'if', 'while', 'for', and 'case labels'. Scale: 1-4 (low complexity) 5-7 (moderate complexity) 8-10 (high complexity) 10+ (very high complexity)
